author: The Critical Drinker
description:
The return of fan favourite heroes, no girlbosses, no quippy jokes and no stupid lectures. The first teasers for this movie almost look... good. Have Marvel finally learned from their mistakes and taken steps to fix the MCU, or is this all just a bait and switch? Let's find out.

title: Avengers: Doomsday - Have Marvel Learned From Their Mistakes?
